page.title: 04NORTH/SOUTH OF THE A4119 RD.
page.content: {LANDSCAPE/BUILDINGS:}Rural, based upon a farming community, with traces of mines and quarries and railway still visible. {FARMING:}Brofiscin Farm has factory type farming with intensive interior feeding sheds for calves and birds. Gelli Wen Farm is an intensive dairy unit with high yielding Freisian cows sending milk to local Bridgend Creamery. {INDUSTRY:} Quarries once provided stone for building, road making and as flux in blast furnaces. {CROFFTA VINEYARD:}Mr John Bevan has 3 acres under grapes which he harvests to produce his own Croffta White Wines. The vineyard is on south facing slopes in the Ely Valley, growing as far north as it is possible for them to exit.
